UPDATE.LOG:
games/libretro-snes9x2010: fix build
- Fix build by changing gcc-specific argument to clang compatible (-flto=auto -> -flto). This change was upstreamed so it may be dropped on the next port update. For FreeBSD 11, don't use -flto at all to also fix the build. - While here, minor style fixes
